channel.title: Really need help plz

item.title: Really need help plz
item.dc:creator: @lol156 lol156
item.description:
@lol156 wrote:

hi,
I added a few commands and portals to my server that use playerismember (I just chose that one because I don’t use it)
but problem is if I use command to set playerismember to 1 or 2 or 3 or 4
than it sets the number after playerismember in charfiles to 1 or 2 or 3 or 4 (so that works fine)
but if I click portal that uses it: case …:
if (playerIsMember = 2){
teleportToX = …;
teleportToY = …;
} else if (playerIsMember = 4){
…
break;
so problem is is I click portal ismember sets to 0 (and portal does nothing)
plz help me.

Read full topic
